dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Almaty's Department for Emergency Situations is warning of some really intense weather starting tomorrow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almaty's Department for Emergency Situations is warning of some really intense weather starting tomorrow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Heavy rain, thunderstorms, and squally winds are expected in Almaty on May 23, according to the city's Department for Emergency Situations (DES).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw that. They're talking about thunderstorms, hail, and wind gusts up to 20 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw that. They're talking about thunderstorms, hail, and wind gusts up to twenty meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities said that during the second half of the day, the city may see thunderstorms, hail, and wind gusts reaching 18"20 meters per second during storms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's like, what, nearly hurricane-force winds in those storms, right? That's no joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's like, what, nearly hurricane-force winds in those storms, right? That's no joke.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they're strongly urging people to avoid hiking in the mountains, which makes total sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they're strongly urging people to avoid hiking in the mountains, which makes total sense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We strongly urge residents and tourists to follow personal safety precautions and avoid hiking in the mountains.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, you do not wanna be caught on a trail when that hits. The timing's interesting too—it says the worst will be in the second half of the day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, you do not wanna be caught on a trail when that hits. The timing's interesting too-it says the worst will be in the second half of the day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities said that during the second half of the day, the city may see thunderstorms, hail, and wind gusts reaching 18"20 meters per second during storms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just one day either. They're forecasting similar conditions through the 25th, with possible hail every day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just one day either. They're forecasting similar conditions through the twenty fifth, with possible hail every day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 24, partly cloudy skies will continue, with rain, thunderstorms, and possible hail. On May 25, partly cloudy skies, intermittent rain, thunderstorms, and daytime hail are expected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Temperatures are still pretty warm though, like mid-twenties during the day. But with all that rain and wind, it's gonna feel chaotic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Temperatures are still pretty warm though, like mid-twenties during the day. But with all that rain and wind, it's gonna feel chaotic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nighttime temperatures will be +16¦+18ÂC, rising to +25¦+27ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And those nighttime temps dropping to around 13 to 15 degrees by the 25th—that's a noticeable cooldown after the storms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And those nighttime temps dropping to around thirteen to fifteen degrees by the twenty fifth-that's a noticeable cooldown after the storms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 25, partly cloudy skies, intermittent rain, thunderstorms, and daytime hail are expected. Nighttime temperatures will be +13¦+15ÂC, and daytime +25¦+27ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder if this is part of a bigger system? They mentioned Astana too in an earlier forecast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder if this is part of a bigger system? They mentioned Astana too in an earlier forecast.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, meteorologists issued an Astana and Almaty weather forecast for May 23"25.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Probably, yeah. Spring weather can be so volatile in that region. Always keeps the emergency services on their toes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably, yeah. Spring weather can be so volatile in that region. Always keeps the emergency services on their toes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Well, if anyone's listening from Almaty, uh, maybe just plan for indoor day tomorrow.
